page.title: 15Roads around Aston Clinton
page.content: The main A41 road runs straight through Aston Clinton it cuts the village in half. In about 60 minutes 1090 Vehicles will have passed through the centre of Aston Clinton. The most important road is the A41 then the A41(M) (Tring bypass). The Upper Ickneild Way goes to Wendover Woods and near Halton where there is an R.A.F base, it finishes at Buckland Wharf. The Lower Ickneild Way is the way to Ivinghoe, Wilstone and Marsworth. There are a lot of accidents on the A41 luckily not many people are killed. Many of the minor roads around Tring rarely get used because it is country and are usually Single Track Roads. This often leads to roads cracking these would be repaired instantly if the Council had more money. So our roads go unrepaired.
